Titles.eng: Tamagotchi: The Movie! The Happiest Story in the Universe!?
Titles.jpn: Eiga! Tamagotchi: Uchû ichi happy na monogatari!?

Summaries.eng: Mametchi and his friends must save Tamagotchi world from a book that is beginning to destroy reality, entitled "The World's Happiest Story".

Aliases: 映画! たまごっち うちゅーいちハッピーな物語!?
